title: Tata Motors urges govt to keep hybrid tax as Toyota seeks cut
description: Tata Motors opposed tax cuts on hybrid cars in India, citing their higher pollution levels compared to pure electric vehicles. The Indian government promotes electric vehicles with a 5% tax, while hybrids are taxed at up to 43%. Toyota, which popularized hybrids with the Prius, has been urging India to lower taxes on hybrids, claiming they reduce carbon emissions.
